channel.title: Points
channel.description:
So, I want to make a point Shop. Just like Assault.
But I want the monster that you earn points from to be; Green Dragons, Mithral Dragons, Chaos elemental, and KBD.
So basically just like, You kill the KBD you get 25 points, and you can spend it at this shop.
How do i do that?
Thankyou.

item.title: Points
item.dc:creator: @Sonneillon Sonneillon
item.description:
@Sonneillon wrote:

What source are you on? I may be able to help.
